#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

bool isElephantHappy(int arr[], int N, int C) {
	for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
		C -= arr[i];
	return (C >= 0);
}
int main() 
{
	int arr[10000];
	int N, C, T;
	cin>>T;
	while (T--) {
		cin>>N>>C;
		for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) 
			cin>>arr[i];
		if (isElephantHappy(arr, N, C))
			cout<<"Yes"<<endl;
		else
			cout<<"No"<<endl;
	}
}
